mapper.sql: supplier_bid_code, supplier_credit_code, tender_plan_code, bid_start_date, bid_end_date, come_from, status, first_quote, end_quote, remark, bid_date, order_by
mapper.select: select a.supplier_bid_code, a.tender_plan_code, a.bid_start_date, a.bid_end_date, a.come_from, a.status, a.first_quote, a.end_quote, a.remark, a.bid_date, a.order_by, b.* from bid_supplier a join tenant_${parentTenantAccount}.supplier b on a.supplier_credit_code = b.supplier_credit_code ${sqlWhere} order by if(isnull(order_by),99999,order_by), a.first_quote

select a.supplier_bid_code, a.tender_plan_code, a.bid_start_date, a.bid_end_date, a.come_from, a.status, a.first_quote, a.end_quote, a.remark, a.bid_date, a.order_by, b.* from bid_supplier a join supplier b on a.supplier_credit_code = b.supplier_credit_code join bid_evaluation_report c on a.tender_plan_code = c.tender_plan_code join tender_result_change d on d.bid_result_code = c.bid_result_code and d.tender_result_id_change_code = #{changeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by if(isnull(order_by),99999,order_by), a.first_quote limit 1

select a.supplier_bid_code, a.supplier_credit_code, a.tender_plan_code, a.bid_start_date, a.bid_end_date, a.come_from, a.status, a.first_quote, a.end_quote, a.remark, a.bid_date, a.order_by from bid_supplier a join bid_evaluation_report c on a.tender_plan_code = c.tender_plan_code and c.bid_result_code = #{tenderResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by if(isnull(order_by),99999,order_by), a.first_quote limit 1

select tender_plan_code, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(supplier_credit_code order by if(isnull(order_by),99999,order_by), first_quote), ',', 1 ) supplier_credit_code from bid_supplier a where exists ( select 1 from bid_evaluation_report b where ${value} and a.tender_plan_code = b.tender_plan_code ) group BY tender_plan_code
mapper.insert: insert into bid_supplier (supplier_bid_code, supplier_credit_code, tender_plan_code, bid_start_date, bid_end_date, come_from, status, first_quote, end_quote, remark, bid_date, order_by ) values (#{supplierBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierCreditCode.supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenderPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bidEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{comeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{endQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into bid_supplier
supplier_bid_code,
supplier_credit_code,
tender_plan_code,
bid_start_date,
bid_end_date,
come_from,
status,
first_quote,
end_quote,
remark,
bid_date,
order_by,
#{supplierBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierCreditCode.supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenderPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bidStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{bidEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{comeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{firstQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{endQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update bid_supplier
supplier_credit_code = #{supplierCreditCode.supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tender_plan_code = #{tenderPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid_start_date = #{bidStartDate,jdbcType=DATE},
bid_end_date = #{bidEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
come_from = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_quote = #{firstQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
end_quote = #{endQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid_date = #{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE},
order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where supplier_bid_code = #{supplierBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bid_supplier set supplier_credit_code = #{supplierCreditCode.supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tender_plan_code = #{tenderPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_start_date = #{bidStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, bid_end_date = #{bidEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, come_from = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_quote = #{firstQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, end_quote = #{endQuote,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_date = #{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, order_by = #{orderBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where supplier_bid_code = #{supplierBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
